
```{r karyotype results}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| eval: !expr params$kuadrc_karyotype

karyotype <- karyotype %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    dschrom_label = factor(
      dschrom,
      levels = 1:3,
      labels = c("Trisomy 21", "Translocation", "Mosaic")
    ),
    chromsm_source_label = factor(
      chromsm_source,
      levels = c("IU", "medrec", "copartic"),
      labels = c(
        "Indiana University",
        "Medical Record",
        "Parent or Care Partner Reported"
      )
    )
  )

karyotype <- karyotype[!duplicated(karyotype), ]

if (!is.na(karyotype$dschrom_label)) {
  BRIDGE21::format_quarto("sections/blood/latex/karyotype.tex", type = "input")
  cat("\\textbf{Karyotype Result}: ", as.character(karyotype$dschrom_label))
  BRIDGE21::format_quarto(type = "newpage")
}
```
